activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
Weyerhaeuser collects personal data from job applicants, employees, consumers, customers, suppliers and others located in the EU/EEA and Switzerland through Weyerhaeuser websites, email, in person, facsimile and by telephone.  Weyerhaeuser may use the personal data (i) to respond to requests; (ii) to evaluate the quality of its products; (iii) to communicate about its products and related issues; (iv) for general employment purposes, including recruiting, HR administration, career development, succession planning, making employment-related decisions, training, payroll, compensation and benefits; (v) for internal reporting, budgeting, accounting, auditing and health and safety programs; (vi) to carry out compliance investigations and audits, including financial, commercial, legal, environmental health and safety; (vii) to provide IT support and maintain databases; and (viii) for other internal management and administrative and to comply with its legal obligations, policies and procedures.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President of Human Resources
